pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, March 3, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement and hold a media availability with Minister of International Trade, Export Promotion, Small Business and Economic Development Mary Ng.

RBC Foundry Room, Bayview Yards
7 Bayview Station Road
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event are asked to arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.
  • The event will be livestreamed on the Canada Business Facebook page.

The Prime Minister will chair a meeting of the Incident Response Group on the situation in Ukraine.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Prime Minister of the Netherlands, Mark Rutte.
